colorful.description: Cycles through bright colors and emits small particles

ghost_star.description: Blurred text with orbiting glowing stars

matrix_rain.name: Matrix Rain

electric_shock.description: Shaking text with lightning bolt overlays

smoke_trail.description: Text that fades while smoke drifts upward

pixel_glitch.description: Layered channel offsets with positional glitches

karaoke_sentence_box.name: Karaoke Sentence Box
karaoke_sentence_box.description: Sentence-group karaoke with TikTok-style box highlight on active word

dynamic_highlight.description: Highlights current word using secondary color

movie_credits.description: Cinematic movie credits with slow fade and letterbox

mirror_reflect.name: Mirror Reflect
mirror_reflect.description: Text with fading mirror reflection below

slam_ground.description: Text slams down with ground impact

power_up.description: Dragon Ball style power up with aura

paint_brush.description: Text painted with colorful brush strokes

neon_flicker.description: Realistic neon sign with broken letter flicker

game_damage.name: Game Damage
game_damage.description: Video game damage taken with red flash and shake

level_up.description: RPG level up with sparkles and golden glow

tornado_spin.description: Text caught in tornado with debris

underwater.description: Underwater effect with bubbles and wavy motion

magic_spell.name: Magic Spell
magic_spell.description: Magic circle with runes and energy convergence

disco_ball.description: Disco ball with rotating colored lights

jackpot_spin.description: Slot machine spin with jackpot reveal
